alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 31 at 1:10PM MST until July 31 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Central Arizona, including the following county, Pima. * WHEN...Until 415 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 110 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Up to 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Santa Rosa, Pisinemo, Covered Wells, San Simon, Palo Verde Stand, Ak Chin, Cababi, Sil Nakya, San Luis - Sells District, Mountain Village, San Luis, Rincon, Santa Rosa School and San Simon West. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
